modules.description: This module provides a function `simple` that creates a configuration for dynamic garbage collection based on the size of the major heap. It adjusts the `space_overhead` parameter between 120 and 80 depending on whether the heap is below or above a specified memory threshold in megabytes. It is used to optimize garbage collection performance by adapting to memory pressure in real-time applications.

This module exposes a function `space_overhead_of_heap_size` that calculates the space overhead for a given heap size based on a provided configuration. It operates on a `DynamicGc.config` type and an integer representing heap size, returning an integer value indicating the overhead. This function is used internally for testing and tuning garbage collection behavior under specific memory constraints.

This module dynamically tunes garbage collection parameters based on heap size, using a configuration that specifies memory thresholds and space overhead limits. It provides functions to set up and stop dynamic tuning, and a testing function to calculate space overhead for a given heap size. It is used to optimize garbage collection efficiency in applications with varying memory pressure by adjusting overhead between 80 and 120 based on heap size in megabytes.
